name: Port Douglas Backpackers
description:
Port Douglas Backpackers has the ideal location in the heart of this little beach side township, just 5 minutes’ walk to everything.  We offer you freebies such as Free WiFi in common areas, Netflix in TV room. Trivia and karaoke nights at our Paddy's pub on Tuesdays. We have heaps of sweet spaces to chill or play like the decked out pool area, bar, open air TV Room or alfresco dining. Please note our most recent company changes, as we wish to be a genuine backpackers hostel. We require all guests staying in shared dorm facility's, be between the ages of 18-35, with allowance to genuine backpackers holding foreign passports. 

All rooms have AC, swipe card access and lockers  You’ll love the super relaxed vibe and our team who will make you feel right at home.  Sure most backpackers will follow the usual trend of partying their way up the East Coast with a grand finale in Cairns which we highly recommend, but make sure you leave a few nights spare to relax and unwind on the stunning beach in Port Douglas.  Plus with the World Heritage Daintree Rainforest and Great Barrier Reef on our doorstep and amazing tours available from right here its also a great base for your TNQ adventure!
Facilities in a nutshell

Free Wifi
Fully equipped kitchen with lots of equipment, walk in fridge and plenty of storage 
An awesome team to make you feel right at home and give you all the locals tips
Air-conditioning, swipe card access, lockers and USB chargers in all rooms
Laundry  
Free onsite undercover parking        
Free Luggage storage 

We have a variety of accommodation options to choose from, so whether you are looking to share a dorm from 6 to 10 beds filled with your newest friends, or to splash out on one of our Deluxe Queen Rooms with ensuite, fridge and tea & coffee making facilities, you will find it here!

Let the team know if your interested in long term options available, we are happy to chat and inform you of all availability or wait lists

houseRules.notes:
Any inquiries or bookings for groups over 10 people must be booked through the Hostel Manager and are at the managers discretions.  Different rates and T&C will apply.

All guests must provide a passport or current drivers licence on arrival. Proof of age cards are not accepted.
Check in time is 2pm  free luggage storage is available for early arrivals
Any guest under the age of 18yrs must be accompanied by their legal guardian and be in a private room.
We require all guests staying in shared dorm facility's, be between the ages of 18-35.
A one night cancellation fee applies to any reservation cancelled within 24 hours of arrival.

Groups of 4-10 require a credit card pre-authorisation of $100 on arrival as well as a $10 key deposit per person.  If people in groups are arriving separately, the first person to arrive needs to pay in full for the whole group as well as the bonds.
